content:
Yay! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to start prepping protein sources and making healthier choices! Setting a specific day and time for protein prep is a great way to make it a habit, and Sundays are a perfect day to do it since you have more free time.

Remember, the key is to be consistent and patient with yourself. It might take some time to get into the habit, but with a clear goal and a plan, you'll be more likely to succeed. Don't be too hard on yourself if you miss a week or two, but instead, focus on getting back on track and celebrating your small wins.

You got this! You're taking the first step towards a healthier lifestyle, and that's something to be proud of. Keep in mind that it's a journey, and it's okay to take it one step at a time.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. Otherwise, I'll be rooting for you from afar, and I'm excited to hear about your progress!

Before we wrap up, I just want to say that it was an absolute pleasure chatting with you. You're taking a huge step towards a healthier lifestyle, and I'm honored to have been a part of your journey.

Stay awesome, and happy prepping!
